name: Vegan Carrot Cake Baked Oatmeal
description: This Vegan Carrot Cake Baked Oatmeal has roasted carrots,, spices, nuts, dates and Oats! Crisp on the outside and spiced, delicious carrot cake like inside.  No Added oil. Vegan Soyfree Recipe. Easily nutfree, gluten-free
recipeIngredient: 2 cups lightly packed grated carrots ((Use 1.5 cups if skipping the roasting step (step 1)))
1.5 cups old fashioned oats (, use certified gluten-free if needed)
1 teaspoon ground cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice or a mix of cinnamon and nutmeg
optional add ins: 1-2 tbsp seeds of choice such  chia or pumpkin
1 cup non dairy milk such as coconut or almond
1 tsp coconut sugar + 1/4 tsp cinnamon for topping (, optional)
whipped coconut cream (,maple syrup, fruits or vegan butter for serving)

recipeInstructions.text: Add carrots to a greased baking dish. Bake at 375 F ( 190 C) for 15-17 mins . Skip this step for faster recipe, or less roasted carrot. Reduce the oven temperature to 350 F(180 C).
recipeInstructions.name: Add carrots to a greased baking dish. Bake at 375 F ( 190 C) for 15-17 mins . Skip this step for faster recipe, or less roasted carrot. Reduce the oven temperature to 350 F(180 C).

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, mix the oats with the rest of the dry ingredients(baking powder through coconut/seeds) in a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, mix the oats with the rest of the dry ingredients(baking powder through coconut/seeds) in a bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the baking dish from the oven. Add the oats mixture and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the baking dish from the oven. Add the oats mixture and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the milk, maple and vanilla and mix, press and mix. If the mixture starts drying out, add 1-2 tbsp more milk. Even it out.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the milk, maple and vanilla and mix, press and mix. If the mixture starts drying out, add 1-2 tbsp more milk. Even it out.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle cinnamon sugar (optional) on top and Bake for 30 to 35 mins (depending on preference of texture of the baked oatmeal). Let it sit for a few mins, then serve warm with maple syrup, or whipped coconut cream, fruit/fruit compote or vegan butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle cinnamon sugar (optional) on top and Bake for 30 to 35 mins (depending on preference of texture of the baked oatmeal). Let it sit for a few mins, then serve warm with maple syrup, or whipped coconut cream, fruit/fruit compote or vegan butter.

keywords: carrot cake baked oatmeal, carrot cake oatmeal, carrot oatmeal
